item.title: Putter vs Habit Tracker
item.description: A putter vs a habit tracker # What’ll Project Oyster’s ðŸŒŠ first story be? To reach my goals, I’ll focus on one thing and invest all my time in its growth. To do so, I purged projects I’ve already started - a painful task because I love all of my ideas and can see a future where they are successful. Though, this future is only in my head. Two ideas remained that I see suited to kickstart Project Oyster: a putter and an analog habit-tracker.

item.title: Hello, world!
